article.title: Gemini 3、ついに登場　「驚異的」な性能と既存ユーザーへの影響
article.summary: Googleがついに最新AIモデル「Gemini 3」を発表した。推論能力や長期タスクの計画能力が向上したという。アプリの新機能も併せて発表された。われわれの日常業務はどう変わるのだろうか。

all_candidates.title: YC-backed Poly relaunches as a cloud-hosted file storage with AI search
all_candidates.summary: Poly's cloud-based file storage system with AI-powered search lets you search through text, images, audio, and video.

all_candidates.title: The Google Search of AI agents? Fetch launches ASI:One and Business tier for new era of non-human web
all_candidates.summary: Fetch AI , a startup founded and led by former DeepMind founding investor, Humayun Sheikh, on Wednesday announced the release of three interconnected products designed to provide the trust, coordination, and interoperability needed for large-scale AI agent ecosystems. The launch includes ASI:One , a personal-AI orchestration platform; Fetch Business , a verification and discovery portal for brand agents; and Agentverse , an open directory hosting more than two million agents. all_candidates.title: VentureBeat launches “Beyond the Pilot” — a new podcast series exploring how enterprise AI gets real
all_candidates.summary: Premiering November 19 VentureBeat is proud to announce the launch of its new flagship podcast, Beyond the Pilot: Enterprise AI in Action , premiering November 19 and brought to you by our anchor sponsor, Outshift by Cisco . Enterprise AI has reached a new inflection point: workloads are going live, and the constraints are getting real. all_candidates.title: MetaチーフAIサイエンティストのルカン博士が辞任し、AI企業立ち上げへ
all_candidates.summary: MetaチーフAIサイエンティストのヤン・ルカン博士は、同社を退社して先端機械知能研究（AMI）を継続するためのスタートアップを立ち上げると発表した。新企業は「Metaとパートナーになる」としている。
